advancement.projectomnipotence.omnipoten: All is one and one is all
message.projectomnipotence.ascend: You start to feel as if you were in complete harmony with the world around you...
message.projectomnipotence.descend: The feeling of being one with all starts to fade away...
message.projectomnipotence.failed_descen: You see past the lies and remain in complete harmony.
message.projectomnipotence.attunement: You become more attuned with the world...
message.projectomnipotence.invulnerabili: The feeling of vulnerability begins to fade away...
